Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
DataMovementFileAdaptor(GATContext gatContext, Preferences preferences, java.net.URI location)
          Constructs a DefaultFileAdaptor instance which corresponds to the physical file identified by the passed URI and whose access rights are determined by the passed GATContext.

Constructor Detail

DataMovementFileAdaptor

public DataMovementFileAdaptor(GATContext gatContext,
                               Preferences preferences,
                               java.net.URI location)
                        throws AdaptorCreationException
Constructs a DefaultFileAdaptor instance which corresponds to the physical file identified by the passed URI and whose access rights are determined by the passed GATContext.

Parameters:
location - A URI which represents the URI corresponding to the physical file.
gatContext - A GATContext which is used to determine the access rights for this DefaultFileAdaptor.
